[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) I don't see it (using [my branch](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-markdown/pull/24) your link works great), but looks like it a handler was added to the current ssb-markdown [here](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-markdown/commit/93d289163b5c1ae0ef6c07cff89a4beb13799ecb). I wonder whether it's an ssbc/marked thing? Not sure, I see your link as: ```html

Here's a config file from my i3 desktop setup: config

``` I'm a bit skeptical of the `&`, but the link works correctly.
